author: ggovi
body:
#### PR description:

This PR contains changes for the conddb command line tools:

- New options for listRuns: _limit_ (limit the number of run items fetched), _match_ (search for a specific run), _from_/_to_ (select a run ranges specifying run,time or timestamp), _last_ (fetch the last run)
- Bug fix for edit --header function ( introduced while moving towards the python3 syntax)

#### PR validation:

unit tests
title: Conddb tools: improvements for listRun function
